titleStmt.title: SII 5.257: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 257. (A.R. No. 581 of 1893). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śubhamastu . svasti . śrīmanmahāmaṇḍaleśvaran harihararāyavibhāṭan bhāṣaikkuttappum Irāyarkaṇ
ṭaṉ muvarāyarkaṇṭaṉ kaṇṭanāṭu koṇṭu koṇṭanāṭu kuṭātāṉ pūrvvadakṣiṇapaścima
uttara samudrādhipati śrīvīravijayarāya kumāra mahārāyadevarāyar gajaveṭṭai Ā
ṭi pṛthivirājyam paṇṇiyaruḷāniṉṟa śakābdam 1000 3 100 6 10 3 ṉ melcellāniṉṟa durmmavi
saṃvatsarattu makaranāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu dvādaśiyum veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa ro hiṇināḷ Irāyar tiruvitikaḷ śrīmatu
māyanāyakkauṭaiyar nirupappaṭikku pradhāni Alaṅkayam tirukkaivelaḻakiyār kāṅkayar Uṭaiyapirāṭṭi ccaturvvedimaṅkalam
Āṉa koḻiñcipāṭiyil kāṇiyāḷar kaiyyāle Udakadhārāpūrvvakamāka Ivvūr nayiṉār Aḻakiya cokkanārkkut tirunāmattuk kāṇiyākak kuṭu
ppitta maṭaviḷāka Aḻakiya cokkapuram melpārkkellai vāykkālukkuk kiḻakkuk kiḻpārkkellai kaḻukakoṭṭaikku meṟ
kut teṉpārkkellai brahmacārippiḷḷaiyār koyilukku vaṭakku vaṭapārkkellai pālapperuvaḻikkut teṟ
ku Iṉṉāṉkellaikkuṭpaṭ=ṭa nilattil Eṟum Uḻavukuṭi kaiviṉaikkuṭi kācāyakkuṭiyiṟ koḷḷum ciṟṟāyam kāṇi
kkai kaṭṭāyam cuṅkam paṭṭaṭaivari vaṇmai nāṭṭuviṉiyokam veṭṭi vekāri Uluppai Ūḻiyam
maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa Upātiyum sarvvamānnya Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṉṉāyinārkkuc cempilum cilaiyilum
veṭṭikkuṭuttamaikku Inta ddharmmattukku hitampaṇṇinavarkaḷukkup paramapadamām
Ahitam paṇṇiṉavarkaḷ gaṅgai kkaraiyil kapilaiyaik koṉṟa pāpattile povarkaḷ
Ippaṭikku māyanaāyakka Uṭaiyar Eḻuttu Ippaṭikkuk kāṅkayar Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Uṭaiyār Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku
kaṟpakanayinār Eḻuttu Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ cuvakampattareṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ pallavarāyareṉ ṉāṭṭukkaṇakku taṭuttāṭkoIncomplete.
Digital edition of SII 5.257 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
